general: Today, the Moon in Pisces enhances your sensitivity and intuition. You will be particularly receptive to the emotions of others, which can help you establish deep connections. Pay attention to the synchronicities that surround you.
love: Dare to express your feelings; vulnerability is a strength.
work: Collaborate with your colleagues on creative projects; unity is strength.
health: Take time for meditation or yoga; it will soothe your mind.
advice: Listen to your heart, it always knows what to do.
